content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ethics and Compliance Library is available at \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/SitePages/Home.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/SitePages/Home.aspx\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" from EPAM network only and contains approved standards, processes descriptions, guidelines, sample documents and templates for managing, developing and maintaining software applications, databases and documentation.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Some information about Ethics and Compliance Library is available at Home page: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/SitePages/Home.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ECL\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To summarize, we use ECL to check whether there is and approved by QMS instruction on some process, e.g. Business Trip Handling, Access to email services, Vacation handling, Coding standards, etc. Instructions are available for all EPAM employees. On the Home page we can see navigation pane on the left with various sections describing info, which can be found in Ethics and Compliance Library.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If employee is inquiring about some document or in instruction or standard process description, first of all try looking for instruction in Ethics and Compliance Library.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
